==Story==
===Mondstadt===
{{VO/Traveler
|language            = ja
|name                = 旅人
|name1               = 空
|name2               = 蛍
|name3               = パイモン

|vo_01_01_title      = 風車について…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = About the Windmills
|vo_01_01_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_01_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Windmills.ogg
|vo_01_01_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Windmills.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = '''{name3}：'''モンドには風車がたくさんあるよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''モンド城は水平面より上にあるから、風車を使って水を{{MC|くみ上げてる|上に運んでる|mc=1}}んだっけ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''正解！モンドの四季はいずれも風が付きものだからな、おかげで水源の供給も安定してるんだ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''それに、風車は「見える風」だろ&mdash;&mdash;それから、風鈴は「聞こえる風」だ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''みんな風神の加護を代表する縁起物みたいなものだな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''なるほど、パイモンと同じマスコットみたいなもの{{MC|か|かな|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''違う！風車は木でできたもので非常食には使えないし、歯みがきぐらいにしか使えないだろ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''……<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''…ツッコんだ方がいい？
|vo_01_01_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Mondo ni wa fuusha ga takusan aru yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Mondo-jou wa suiheimen yori ue ni aru kara, fuusha wo tsukatte mizu wo {{MC|kumiageteru|ue ni hakonderu|mc=1}} nda kke.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Seikai! Mondo no shiki wa izure mo kaze ga tsukimono da kara na, o-kage de suigen no kyoukyuu mo antei shiteru nda.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sore ni, fuusha wa "mieru kaze" daro{{lmdash}} sore kara, fuurin wa "kikoeru kaze" da.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Minna Fuujin no kago wo daihyou suru engimono mitai-na mono da na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Naruhodo, Paimon to onaji masukotto mitai-na mono {{MC|ka|ka na|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Chigau! Fuusha wa ki de dekita mono de hijoushoku ni wa tsukaenai shi, ha-migaki gurai ni shika tsukaenai daro!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ......<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ...Tsukkonda hou ga ii?
|vo_01_01_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Mondstadt sure has a lot of windmills.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' The City of Mondstadt is built above water, so it uses windmills to draw the water upwards, doesn't it?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' That's right! All four seasons in Mondstadt are always accompanied by the wind, which makes this supply of water stable.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Also, windmills are the "visible winds" &mdash; and wind chimes are the "audible winds."<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' They're like good luck charms that represent the Anemo Archon's protection of everyone.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' I see, so they're like mascots, just like Paimon.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' No! Windmills are made of wood so you can't use them as emergency food, and all they'd be good for is grinding your teeth!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ......<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...Should I have remarked on that?

|vo_01_02_title      = 酒場のオーナーについて…
|vo_01_02_subtitle   = About the Tavern Owner
|vo_01_02_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_02_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Tavern Owner.ogg
|vo_01_02_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Tavern Owner.ogg
|vo_01_02_tx         = '''({name})：'''大量のチップを渡せば、酒場のオーナーから小声で情報を教えてもらえるって聞いたけど。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''「エンジェルズシェア」か？でも、ディルックの旦那は金持ちだって聞いたぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''どれくらいチップを渡したら、彼に「大量」だって思われるんだ？<br /><!--
					-->'''({name})：'''うーん…{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}の勘違いだったかな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|別の世界|これは別の世界|mc=1}}で聞いた話だったの{{MC|かもしれない|かも|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
					-->'''{name3}：'''いろんな世界に行ったんだな。
|vo_01_02_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Tairyou no chippu wo wataseba, sakaba no oonaa kara kogoe de jouhou wo oshiete moraeru tte kiita kedo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' "Enjeruzu Shea" ka? De mo, Dirukku no danna wa kanemochi da tte kiita zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Dore kurai chippu wo watashitara, kare ni "tairyou" da tte omowareru nda?<br /><!--
					-->'''(Tabibito):''' Uun... {{MC|Ore|Watashi|mc=1}} no kanchigai datta ka na.<br /><!--
					-->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Betsu no sekai|Kore wa betsu no sekai|mc=1}} de kiita hanashi datta no {{MC|ka mo shirenai|ka mo|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
					-->'''Paimon:''' Ironna sekai ni itta nda na.
|vo_01_02_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' I've heard that if you give a considerable tip, you can get tavern owners to whisper some information to you.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' At "Angel's Share"? But I heard that Master Diluc is a rich man.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' How big a tip do you have to give for him to think it's "considerable"?<br /><!--
					-->'''(Traveler):''' Huh... Maybe I was mistaken.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' This might have been a story I heard in another world...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' You sure have been to all kinds of worlds.

|vo_01_03_title      = シードル湖について…
|vo_01_03_subtitle   = About [[Cider Lake]]
|vo_01_03_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_03_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Cider Lake.ogg
|vo_01_03_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Cider Lake.ogg
|vo_01_03_tx         = '''{name3}：'''シードル湖は凍らない湖だから、1年中凍ることはないぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''モンド最高のリンゴ酒は、この湖の甘い水を使ってるんだ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''この湖の水って本当に美味しいんだぞ！オイラなんて1秒で2瓶飲める！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''すごい{{MC|な|ね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''フフン。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンのような体でそんなに水を飲んで…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''風スライムみたいに空気漏れして飛んだりしないんだ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''フン、美味しい飲み物は別腹だ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''うん…世界って{{MC|広い|広いな|mc=1}}、時間をかけて考えないといけないことがまだまだ{{MC|ある|あるんだね|mc=1}}…
|vo_01_03_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Shiidoru-ko wa kooranai mizuumi da kara, ichinen-juu kooru koto wa nai zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mondo saikou no ringo-shu wa, kono mizuumi no amai mizu wo tsukatteru nda.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kono mizuumi no mizu tte hontou ni oishii nda zo! Oira nante ichibyou de futabin nomeru!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sugoi {{MC|na|ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Fufun.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon no you-na karada de sonna ni mizu wo nonde...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kaze Suraimu mitai ni kuuki-more shite tondari shinai nda...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Fun, oishii nomimono wa betsubara da.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Un... Sekai tte {{MC|hiroi|hiroi na|mc=1}}, jikan wo kakete kangaenai to ikenai koto ga mada mada {{MC|aru|aru nda ne|mc=1}}...
|vo_01_03_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Cider Lake is a lake that won't freeze, so it never freezes all year.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mondstadt's best apple ciders are made with the sweet waters of this lake.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' This lake's water is really tasty! I could even drink two bottles in one second!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Wow.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hee-hee.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' If you drink so much water with a body like yours...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' You won't end up leaking air and flying off like an Anemo Slime, will you...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hmph, delicious drinks go into another stomach.<ref group="TN •" name="betsubara">The word {{Lang|mini=1|ja=別腹|ja_rm=betsubara|ja_lit=separate stomach}} is an idiomatic name for still having room for dessert despite being full, rather than a literal statement about Paimon's anatomy.</ref><br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Hmm... The world is such a big place, I still need to think about some things for a while...

|vo_01_04_title      = 禁書エリアの本について…
|vo_01_04_subtitle   = About the Library's Restricted Section
|vo_01_04_quest      = Troublesome Work
|vo_01_04_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Library's Restricted Section.ogg
|vo_01_04_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Library's Restricted Section.ogg
|vo_01_04_tx         = '''({name})：'''リサさんが前に{{MC|言った|言ってた|mc=1}}「禁書エリア」の本…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''気にならない？どんな本が禁書エリアにある{{MC|んだろうか|んだろう|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''もしかして…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''子供向けじゃない本でもあるのかな…？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''なに？『イノシシプリンセス』でさえ禁書エリアじゃないのに！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''あれより子供向けじゃない本があるのか？気になってきたぞ！
|vo_01_04_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Risa-san ga mae ni {{MC|itta|itteta|mc=1}} "kinsho eria" no hon...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Ki ni naranai? Donna hon ga kinsho eria ni aru {{MC|ndarou ka|ndarou|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Moshi ka shite...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kodomo-muke ja nai hon de mo aru no ka na...?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Nani? "Inoshishi Purinsesu" de sae kinsho eria ja nai no ni!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Are yori kodomo-muke ja nai hon ga aru no ka? Ki ni natte kita zo!
|vo_01_04_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' The books in the "restricted area" that Lisa talked about earlier...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Aren't you curious? What kind of books would be in a restricted area?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Perhaps...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' They could be books not suitable for children...?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' What? But even "The Boar Princess" isn't in the restricted area!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Are there books even more unsuitable for children than that? Now I'm curious!

|vo_01_05_title      = 努力と報いについて…
|vo_01_05_subtitle   = About Effort and Reward
|vo_01_05_quest      = For a Tomorrow Without Tears
|vo_01_05_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Effort and Reward.ogg
|vo_01_05_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Effort and Reward.ogg
|vo_01_05_tx         = '''{name3}：'''モンドで必死に働いても報われるとは限らないって気付いたぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|それはどうして|どうして|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ほら、西風騎士のホフマン、毎日仕事頑張ってるだろ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''でもいつものんびりしてるガイアがあいつの上司だ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''うん…でも一番忙しいジンさんが代理団長{{MC|だろ|でしょ|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''いやいや、地位で言ったら…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''一番だらしない吟遊野郎がモンドの神様だぞ！
|vo_01_05_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Mondo de hisshi ni hataraite mo mukuwareru to wa kagiranai tte kidzuita zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Sore wa doushite|Doushite|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hora, Sepyurosu Kishi no Hofuman, mainichi shigoto ganbatteru daro...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' De mo itsumo nonbiri shiteru Gaia ga aitsu no joushi da.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Un... De mo ichiban isogashii Jin-san ga Dairi Danchou {{MC|daro|desho|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Iya iya, chii de ittara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Ichiban darashinai Gin'yuu Yarou ga Mondo no kami-sama da zo!
|vo_01_05_tl         = '''Paimon:''' I've noticed that in Mondstadt, you won't necessarily be rewarded for working your hardest.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Why is that?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Look at Huffman from the Knights of Favonius, he's doing his best at his duties every day...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' But the ever-relaxed Kaeya is his boss.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Hmm... But Jean, the busiest of all, is the Acting Grand Master, isn't she?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' No, no, if we're talking about rank...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Tone-Deaf Bard, the laziest of all, is the god of Mondstadt!

|vo_01_06_title      = ゲーテホテルについて…
|vo_01_06_subtitle   = About the [[Goth Grand Hotel]]
|vo_01_06_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_06_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Goth Grand Hotel.ogg
|vo_01_06_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Goth Grand Hotel.ogg
|vo_01_06_tx         = '''({name})：'''ゲーテホテルに1回泊まってみたい…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''オイラも！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''きっとどの部屋も綺麗で広いんだろうなぁ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でもオーナーの話によると、ファデュイが泊ってから問題が色々あった{{MC|らしい|らしいよ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''雷蛍術師の雷蛍が静電気のせいで灰を吸い寄せて、たくさん死んだとか。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''それから、霧虚ろの花粉とコショウが間違えられたとか…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''「デットエージェント」たちが酒代をめぐって喧嘩沙汰になったとか。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''…頑張れ、ゲーテホテル。
|vo_01_06_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Geete Hoteru ni ikkai tomatte mitai...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oira mo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kitto dono heya mo kirei de hiroi ndarou naa.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo oonaa no hanashi ni yoru to, Fadyui ga tomatte kara mondai ga iroiro atta {{MC|rashii|rashii yo|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Raikei Jutsushi no Raikei ga seidenki no sei de hai wo suiyosete, takusan shinda to ka.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sore kara, Kiriutsuro no Kafun to koshou ga machigaerareta to ka...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' "Detto Eejento"-tachi ga sakadai wo megutte kenkazata ni natta to ka.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...Ganbare, Geete Hoteru.
|vo_01_06_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' I wanna try staying at the Goth Grand Hotel once...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Me too!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Every room is sure to be clean and spacious.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But according to the owner, there have been all kinds of problems since the Fatui started staying there.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' For example, the [[Electro Cicin Mage]]s' [[Electro Cicin]]s attracted ash with static electricity, and a lot of them died.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' And then the [[Mist Grass Pollen]] was confused with the pepper...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' And the [[Fatui Agent|Agents]] broke into a fight over drink money.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...Hang in there, Goth Grand Hotel.

|vo_01_07_title      = 風の流れる方向について…
|vo_01_07_subtitle   = About the Way the Wind Blows
|vo_01_07_quest      = For a Tomorrow Without Tears
|vo_01_07_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Way the Wind Blows.ogg
|vo_01_07_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Way the Wind Blows.ogg
|vo_01_07_tx         = '''({name})：'''モンドは風の国だって{{MC|みんな|みんなは|mc=1}}言うけど。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''今の季節、風向きがどっちなのか知らないな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''吟遊野郎に聞いてみるか。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''彼に聞いても、「えへっ」としか言わないと思う…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''それもそうだな。風神はただの吟遊野郎だし、風のことなんて知らないだろうな…
|vo_01_07_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Mondo wa kaze no kuni da tte {{MC|minna|minna wa|mc=1}} iu kedo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Ima no kisetsu, kazamuki ga docchi na no ka shiranai na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Gin'yuu Yarou ni kiite miru ka.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kare ni kiite mo, "ehe'" to shika iwanai to omou...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sore mo sou da na. Fuujin wa tada no Gin'yuu Yarou da shi, kaze no koto nante shiranai darou na...
|vo_01_07_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Everyone says that Mondstadt is the land of the wind.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But this season, I don't know what direction the winds will blow from.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Shall we ask the Tone-Deaf Bard?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Even if we asked him, I think he wouldn't say more than a "hehe"...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' That's true. The Anemo Archon is just a Tone-Deaf Bard, he probably doesn't know a thing about the wind...

|vo_01_08_title      = 錬金術について…
|vo_01_08_subtitle   = About [[Alchemy]]
|vo_01_08_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_08_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Alchemy.ogg
|vo_01_08_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Alchemy.ogg
|vo_01_08_tx         = '''({name})：'''モンドの錬金作業台は街中にある{{MC|んだ|んだね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''そうだ、おかしいのか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}が今まで旅してきた世界では、錬金術はほとんど秘術として存在してた{{MC|んだ|の|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''錬金術が日常の一部になっているのを見ると、まるで「3つの胃を持つ人」を見たのと同じくらい{{MC|不思議に感じる|不思議な感じがする|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''おい！胃が1つしかない方がおかしいだろ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''……<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''それ本気？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''どうだろうな？
|vo_01_08_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Mondo no renkin sagyoudai wa machinaka ni aru {{MC|nda|nda ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sou da, okashii no ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Ore|Watashi|mc=1}} ga ima made tabi shite kita sekai de wa, renkinjutsu wa hotondo hijutsu toshite sonzai shiteta {{MC|nda|no|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Renkinjutsu ga nichijou no ichibu ni natteiru no wo miru to, maru de "mittsu no i wo motsu hito" wo mita no to onaji kurai {{MC|fushigi ni kanjiru|fushigi-na kanji ga suru|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oi! I ga hitotsu shika nai hou ga okashii daro!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ......<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sore honki?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Dou darou na?
|vo_01_08_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Mondstadt's alchemy workbench is right in the middle of town.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' It is. Is that weird?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' In the other worlds I've been to so far, alchemy was usually practiced as a secret art.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Seeing alchemy become a part of daily life gives me the same strange feeling as seeing "people who have three stomachs"...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hey! Having only one stomach is weirder!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ......<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Are you serious?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' What do you think?

|vo_01_09_title      = テイワットについて…
|vo_01_09_subtitle   = About [[Teyvat]]
|vo_01_09_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_09_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Teyvat.ogg
|vo_01_09_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Teyvat.ogg
|vo_01_09_tx         = '''({name})：'''テイワット大陸の昼夜は{{MC|どっち|どちら|mc=1}}も{{MC|短い気|短いような気|mc=1}}がする。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''ここの夜空にも星がいっぱいあるけど、故郷で見た星とは{{MC|違うな|違う|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''テイワットの人々の運命も、星座と関係する{{MC|んだろうか|のかな|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''へえ？おまえも「星読み」ができるのか？いいなぁ、スメール以外の国でそういう技術を持ってる人はあまりいないからな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''オイラの好奇心に火が付いたぞ！さあ、オイラのことも占ってくれよ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''うん…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンのマフラーにある夜空…星々と深海の光が流れてる…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''星の模様が告げるに…これから7日間…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''7日間…？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''いいこと…もしくは悪いこと…もしくは良くも悪くもないことが起こる{{MC|かもしれない|みたい|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''…岩スライムみたいに何の変哲もない答えだな！
|vo_01_09_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Teiwatto-tairiku no chuuya wa {{MC|docchi|dochira|mc=1}} mo {{MC|mijikai ki|mijikai you-na ki|mc=1}} ga suru.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Koko no yozora ni mo hoshi ga ippai aru kedo, kokyou de mita hoshi to wa {{MC|chigau na|chigau|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Teiwatto no hitobito no unmei mo, seiza to kankei suru {{MC|ndarou ka|no ka na|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hee? Omae mo "hoshiyomi" ga dekiru no ka? Ii naa, Sumeeru igai no kuni de sou iu gijutsu wo motteru hito wa amari inai kara na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oira no koukishin ni hi ga tsuita zo! Saa, oira no koto mo uranatte kure yo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Un...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon no mafuraa ni aru yozora... hoshiboshi to shinkai no hikari ga nagareteru...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Hoshi no moyou ga tsugeru ni... kore kara nanoka-kan...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Nanoka-kan...?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Ii koto... moshiku wa warui koto... moshiku wa yoku mo waruku mo nai koto ga okoru {{MC|ka mo shirenai|mitai|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...Iwa Suraimu mitai ni nan no hentetsu mo nai kotae da na!
|vo_01_09_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Teyvat's day and night both seem short.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' The night sky here is full of stars, but they're not the same stars I saw back home.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Could the fates of people from Teyvat also be related to their constellations?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oh? Do you know how to "read the stars," too? That's great, because there aren't many people in nations other than Sumeru who have that skill.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' My curiosity is all fired up! Come on, do a reading for me!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Hmm...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' The night sky on Paimon's muffler... flows with the light of many stars and the deep sea...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' The patterns of these stars tell me that... in seven days from now...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Seven days...?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' A good thing... or a bad thing... or a neither-good-nor-bad thing might happen...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...That answer's as unremarkable as a Geo Slime!

|vo_01_10_title      = 「自由」の神について…
|vo_01_10_subtitle   = About [[Barbatos|the God of Freedom]]
|vo_01_10_quest      = Song of the Dragon and Freedom
|vo_01_10_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the God of Freedom.ogg
|vo_01_10_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the God of Freedom.ogg
|vo_01_10_tx         = '''({name})：'''そういえば、トワリンを助けてモンドに戻る途中…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''初めて「俗世の七執政」を見た。ああいう神だった{{MC|んだ|んだね|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ん？オイラたちが吟遊野郎と知り合ったのは最近のことじゃないだろ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''彼の風神バルバトスとしての一面、っていう意味でだよ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''吟遊詩人の顔の下には、本物の神様が隠れている。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''「神に命じられた「自由」は、ある意味「不自由」だろう。」<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''彼がトワリンに言ったこの言葉の答え、{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}もまだ考えてるよ…
|vo_01_10_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Sou ieba, Towarin wo tasukete Mondo ni modoru tochuu...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Hajimete "Zokusei no Shichi-shissei" wo mita. Aa iu kami datta {{MC|nda|nda ne|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' N? Oira-tachi ga Gin'yuu Yarou to shiriatta no wa saikin no koto ja nai daro?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kare no Fuujin Barubatosu toshite no ichimen, to iu imi de da yo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Gin'yuu shijin no kao no shita ni wa, honmono no kami-sama ga kakureteiru.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' "Kami ni meijirareta 'jiyuu' wa, aru imi 'fujiyuu' darou."<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kare ga Towarin ni itta kono kotoba no kotae, {{MC|ore|watashi|mc=1}} mo mada kangaeteru yo...
|vo_01_10_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Come to think of it, on the way back to Mondstadt after rescuing Dvalin...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' We saw one of "The Seven Archons" for the first time. So he was that kind of god...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hmm? We didn't get to know the Tone-Deaf Bard all that recently, did we?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' I meant seeing him as the Anemo Archon, Barbatos.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Beneath the face of a bard, there hides a true god.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' "'Freedom' demanded by a god is, in a sense, '{{wt|unfreedom}},' isn't it?"<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Those words he said to Dvalin... I'm still contemplating the answer, too...

|vo_01_11_title      = モンドの地形について…
|vo_01_11_subtitle   = About Mondstadt's Terrain
|vo_01_11_quest      = For a Tomorrow Without Tears
|vo_01_11_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Mondstadt's Terrain.ogg
|vo_01_11_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Mondstadt's Terrain.ogg
|vo_01_11_tx         = '''{name3}：'''モンドの地形の多くは平原と丘陵でできてる。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''言い伝えによると、バルバトスが天地を創る時、暴風で険しい崖や峡湾を平らにしたとか…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でも、綺麗にできてない場所も{{MC|ある|あるよ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''例えば星拾いの崖とかか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|そう|そうだね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''まるで…プラモデルを組み立てる時、綺麗に磨かれなかったゲート跡みたいに。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ゲート跡？なんだそれ？
|vo_01_11_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Mondo no chikei no ooku wa heigen to kyuuryou de dekiteru.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Iitsutae ni yoru to, Barubatosu ga tenchi wo tsukuru toki, boufuu de kewashii gake ya kyouwan wo taira ni shita to ka...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo, kirei ni dekitenai basho mo {{MC|aru|aru yo|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Tatoeba Hoshi-hiroi no Gake to ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Sou|Sou da ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Maru de... puramoderu wo kumitateru toki, kirei ni migakarenakatta geeto ato mitai ni.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Geeto ato? Nan da sore?
|vo_01_11_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Most of Mondstadt's terrain is made up of plains and hills.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' According to legend, when Barbatos made this land, he used the storm to flatten steep cliffs and fjords and such...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But there are still some messy spots.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Like Starsnatch Cliff?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Yes.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' It looks just like... when you build a plastic model, and there's a nub<ref group="TN •" name="stress">In the hobby of building plastic scale models, {{Lang|mini=1|ja=ゲート跡|ja_rm=geeto ato|ja_lit=gate mark}} refers to visible remnants from cutting a piece out of the mold. The Japanese term covers both nubs of extra material (which Starsnatch Cliff is being likened to) and stress marks that result from removing said nubs.</ref> that wasn't quite polished off.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' A nub? What's that?

|vo_01_12_title      = ベニー冒険団について…
|vo_01_12_subtitle   = About [[Benny's Adventure Team]]
|vo_01_12_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_12_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Benny's Adventure Team.ogg
|vo_01_12_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Benny's Adventure Team.ogg
|vo_01_12_tx         = '''{name3}：'''「ベニー冒険団」と一緒に秘境を探索するなら、準備しておいた方がいいぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''秘境は危険だ、出発する前に物資と道具は何度も確認しておけ、油断は禁物だ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''秘境の中には、冒険者協会が統計した死に方だけで463種類あるって聞いたぞ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''もしベネットのせいでおまえが死んだら、オイラもあいつも良心が痛むからな！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''…なんで死ぬのは{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}なの？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ほら、だってオイラは飛べるだろ、その中の322種類の死に方はオイラには効かないんだ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''秘境探検やめようかな…
|vo_01_12_rm         = '''Paimon:''' "Benii Bouken-dan" to issho ni hikyou wo tansaku suru nara, junbi shite oita hou ga ii zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hikyou wa kiken da, shuppatsu suru mae ni busshi to dougu wa nando mo kakunin shite oke, yudan wa kinmotsu da.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hikyou no naka ni wa, Boukensha Kyoukai ga toukei shita shinikata dake de yonhyaku-rokujuu-san-shurui aru tte kiita zo...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Moshi Benetto no sei de omae ga shindara, oira mo aitsu mo ryoushin ga itamu kara na!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ...Nande shinu no wa {{MC|ore|watashi|mc=1}} na no?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hora, da tte oira wa toberu daro, sono naka no sanbyaku-nijuu-ni-shurui no shinikata wa oira ni wa kikanai nda!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Hikyou tanken yameyou ka na...
|vo_01_12_tl         = '''Paimon:''' If you're going to explore domains with "Benny's Adventure Team," you'd better be prepared.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Domains are dangerous, so you should check your materials and tools often before you go, and never be negligent.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I've heard that the Adventurers' Guild's statistics alone list 463 different ways of dying in these domains...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' If you died because of Bennett, both he and I would be pained with remorse!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...Why am I the one dying?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Well, I can fly, so 322 of those ways of dying won't affect me!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Maybe I should give up on exploring domains...

|vo_01_13_title      = ベネットについて…
|vo_01_13_subtitle   = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_01_13_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_13_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Bennett.ogg
|vo_01_13_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Bennett.ogg
|vo_01_13_tx         = '''({name})：'''話に聞いたんだけど、アルバートはバーバラ応援団の団長として…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''バーバラに会うため、よく傷だらけになる{{MC|らしい|らしいよ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''要注意人物だって西風騎士団に言っておかないとな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''けど1ヶ月後、アルバートは気付いた{{MC|んだ|の|mc=1}}…バーバラと会った回数がベネットに負けてる{{MC|と|って|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''なにせ怪我に関しては、ベネットの右に出るものはいないから…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''あいつらは「バーバラに迷惑をかける」試合でもやってるのか！
|vo_01_13_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Hanashi ni kiita nda kedo, Arubaato wa Baabara Ouendan no danchou toshite...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Baabara ni au tame, yoku kizu-darake ni naru {{MC|rashii|rashii yo|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Youchuui-jinbutsu da tte Sepyurosu Kishi-dan ni itte okanai to na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kedo ikkagetsu-go, Arubaato wa kidzuita {{MC|nda|no|mc=1}}... Baabara to atta kaisuu wa Benetto ni maketeru {{MC|to|tte|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Nanise kega ni kanshite wa, Benetto no migi ni deru mono wa inai kara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Aitsura wa "Baabara ni meiwaku wo kakeru" shiai de mo yatteru no ka!
|vo_01_13_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' I've heard that Albert, being the leader of the Barbara Fan Club...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...Apparently gets wounds all over himself often, so that he can see Barbara.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' [We] should tell the Knights of Favonius that he's a suspicious person.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But after a month, Albert realized... When it came to how many times he got to see Barbara, he was losing to Bennett.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Anyway, as far as getting injured is concerned, no one out there beats Bennett...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Are they having a "let's bother Barbara" contest?!

|vo_01_14_title      = アイドルについて…
|vo_01_14_subtitle   = About the [[Barbara|"Idol"]]
|vo_01_14_quest      = Song of the Dragon and Freedom
|vo_01_14_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Idol.ogg
|vo_01_14_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Idol.ogg
|vo_01_14_tx         = '''{name3}：'''バーバラは人気あるよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''彼女はモンドのアイドル{{MC|だから|だからね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''そういえば、オイラちょっと分かんないんだけど…「アイドル」ってなんだ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''一種の職業で、可愛ければみんなに好かれて、モラをたくさん稼げる職業{{MC|だ|かな|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''マスコットとあんま変わらないな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''まあ、そう言える{{MC|かも|かもね|mc=1}}…
|vo_01_14_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Baabara wa ninki aru yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kanojo wa Mondo no aidoru {{MC|da kara|da kara ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sou ieba, oira chotto wakannai nda kedo... "Aidoru" tte nan da?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Isshu no shokugyou de, kawaikereba minna ni sukarete, Mora wo takusan kasegeru shokugyou {{MC|da|ka na|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Masukotto to anma kawaranai na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Maa, sou ieru {{MC|ka mo|ka mo ne|mc=1}}...
|vo_01_14_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Barbara sure is popular.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' That's because she's Mondstadt's idol.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Speaking of which, I don't quite understand, but... What is an "idol"?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' It's an occupation in which if you're cute, you'll be loved by everyone, and earn a lot of Mora.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' That's not too different from being a mascot.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Well, I guess you could say that...

|vo_01_15_title      = 姉妹関係について…
|vo_01_15_subtitle   = About Being Sisters
|vo_01_15_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_15_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Being Sisters.ogg
|vo_01_15_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Being Sisters.ogg
|vo_01_15_tx         = '''({name})：'''リサさんとアンバーの関係は少し姉妹みたい{{MC|だ|だよね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ん？なんでだ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''アンバーはよくリサさんの使い走りをしてる{{MC|だろ|でしょ|mc=1}}。姉が楽したいから妹を使い走りにすることは、よくある話{{MC|だ|だもの|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|俺は妹|私は兄さん|mc=1}}と同い年だから、いつもじゃんけんで決めてたけど。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''そっか、ならおまえはオイラの{{MC|弟|妹|mc=1}}だな！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|なんでそうなる|どうしてそうなるの|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''だってオイラは飛べるからな、実際「走っている」のはおまえだけだぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''？？？
|vo_01_15_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Risa-san to Anbaa-san no kankei wa sukoshi shimai mitai {{MC|da|da yo ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' N? Nande da?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Anbaa wa yoku Risa-san no tsukaihashiri wo shiteru {{MC|daro|desho|mc=1}}. Ane ga raku shitai kara imouto wo tsukaihashiri ni suru koto wa, yoku aru hanashi {{MC|da|da mono|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Ore wa imouto|Watashi wa nii-san|mc=1}} to onaidoshi da kara, itsumo janken de kimeteta kedo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sokka, nara omae wa oira no {{MC|otouto|imouto|mc=1}} da na!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Nande sou naru|Doushite sou naru no|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Da tte oira wa toberu kara na, jissai "hashitteiru" no wa omae dake da zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ???
|vo_01_15_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Lisa and Amber's relationship seems a bit like they're sisters.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Huh? Why's that?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Amber often runs errands for Lisa. Older sisters asking their younger sisters to run errands so that they can relax is an everyday situation.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' I'm the same age as my {{MC|younger sister|older brother|mc=1}}, so we always decided by rock-paper-scissors, though.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I see, so that makes you my younger {{MC|brother|sister|mc=1}}!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' How does that work?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Well, I can fly, so you're the only one who's actually "running"!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ???

|vo_01_16_title      = ガイアの眼帯について…
|vo_01_16_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]'s Eye Patch
|vo_01_16_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_16_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Kaeya's Eye Patch.ogg
|vo_01_16_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Kaeya's Eye Patch.ogg
|vo_01_16_tx         = '''({name})：'''パイモン、ガイアの眼帯の下って見たことある？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''見たことないな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''そういえば、ガイアは1年中眼帯を{{MC|外さない|外さないよね|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''フフン、賢いオイラはもう分かったぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|ん|え|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''きっと大きな秘密があるんだ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''大きな秘密？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ほら、ガイアって外での仕事が多いんだろ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''だからガイアの眼帯の下の肌は、他よりずっと白いに決まってる。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''じゃあ、眼帯を外したら…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''きっとみんなに笑われるぞ！そして変なあだ名をつけられるんだ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''たとえば&mdash;&mdash;「三毛猫」とか！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''まだ眼帯を外してないのに、すでに変なあだ名をつけられてる…
|vo_01_16_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Paimon, Gaia no gantai no shita tte mita koto aru?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mita koto nai na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sou ieba, Gaia wa ichinen-juu gantai wo {{MC|hazusanai|hazusanai yo ne|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Fufun, kashikoi oira wa mou wakatta zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|N|E|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kitto ookina himitsu ga aru nda!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Ookina himitsu?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hora, Gaia tte soto de no shigoto ga ooi ndaro.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Da kara Gaia no gantai no shita no hada wa, hoka yori zutto shiroi ni kimatteru.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Jaa, gantai wo hazushitara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kitto minna ni warawareru zo! Soshite hen-na adana wo tsukerareru nda!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Tatoeba{{lmdash}} "Mike-neko" to ka!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Mada gantai wo hazushitenai no ni, sude ni hen-na adana wo tsukerareteru...
|vo_01_16_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Paimon, have you ever seen what's under Kaeya's eye patch?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Never seen it.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Come to think of it, Kaeya never takes the eye patch off all year...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hee-hee, my clever self already knows why!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Oh?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' He must be keeping a big secret!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' A big secret?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' See, Kaeya does a lot of assignments outside.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' So the skin under Kaeya's eye patch has to be way lighter than the rest of him.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' So, if he takes the eye patch off...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' He'll definitely be laughed at by everyone! And then he'll get a weird nickname!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Like&mdash; "Calico Cat"!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' He hasn't even taken the eye patch off, and yet he's already got a weird nickname...

|vo_01_17_title      = ディルックとガイアについて…
|vo_01_17_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]] and [[Diluc]]
|vo_01_17_quest      = Darknight Hero's Alibi
|vo_01_17_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Kaeya and Diluc.ogg
|vo_01_17_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Kaeya and Diluc.ogg
|vo_01_17_tx         = '''{name3}：'''おかしいなぁ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|どうした|どうしたの|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ディルックの旦那とガイアは似てるのに、仲があまりよくないみたいだな？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''どこが似てるの？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ガイアは…正々堂々とインチキな小細工をするだろ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ディルックの旦那は…裏で正々堂々と戦うだろ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''似てるよな？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''ごめん、よく分からない。
|vo_01_17_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Okashii naa...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Doushita|Doushita no|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Dirukku no danna to Gaia wa niteru no ni, naka ga amari yokunai mitai da na?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Doko ga niteru no?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Gaia wa... seiseidoudou to inchiki na kozaiku wo suru daro.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Dirukku no danna wa... ura de seiseidoudou to tatakau daro.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Niteru yo na?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Gomen, yoku wakaranai.
|vo_01_17_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Strange...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' What's wrong?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Master Diluc and Kaeya are so alike, but why don't they seem to get along?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' How are they alike?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kaeya... will pull off his cheap tricks out in the open.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Master Diluc... will fight fair and square in the shadows.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Aren't they the same?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Sorry, I don't really get it.

|vo_01_18_title      = 戦闘力の単位について…
|vo_01_18_subtitle   = About Measuring Fighting Strength
|vo_01_18_quest      = True Treasure
|vo_01_18_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Measuring Fighting Strength.ogg
|vo_01_18_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Measuring Fighting Strength.ogg
|vo_01_18_tx         = '''({name})：'''1体のヒルチャールがイノシシ3匹を倒せるなら…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''ジン団長とディルックさんは、ヒルチャール何体分の戦力になるんだろう？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''モンドのみんなの話を聞くと、一番すごいのはジン団長だって分かるだろ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でもディルックさんが本気になれば、ジン団長も相手じゃないと思う。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''いや、ジン団長ならきっと大丈夫だ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''きっと相手にならない。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ジン団長の元素爆発は強いぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でも、あの「エリア」はかえってディルックさんの戦力を強める{{MC|だろ|でしょ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ジン団長は神の目を使わなくてもディルックの旦那を倒せるぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''ディルックさんだって訓練用大剣で簡単に…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}たち暇人だ{{MC|な|ね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''みんなモンドのために戦ってるんだから、喧嘩になるわけが{{MC|ない|ないのに|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''だから、ヒルチャールを戦闘力の単位に使った方がいいって言ったんだろ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ちなみに、オイラは5分の1イノシシくらいだぞ。
|vo_01_18_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Ittai no hiruchaaru ga inoshishi sanbiki wo taoseru nara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Jin-danchou to Dirukku-san wa, hiruchaaru nantaibun no senryoku ni naru ndarou?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mondo no minna no hanashi wo kiku to, ichiban sugoi no wa Jin-danchou da tte wakaru daro.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo Dirukku-san ga honki ni nareba, Jin-danchou mo aite ja nai to omou.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Iya, Jin-danchou nara kitto daijoubu da.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kitto aite ni naranai.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Jin-danchou no Genso Bakuhatsu wa tsuyoi zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo, ano "eria" wa kaette Dirukku-san no senryoku wo tsuyomeru {{MC|daro|desho|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Jin-danchou wa Kami no Me wo tsukawanakute mo Dirukku no danna wo taoseru zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Dirukku-san da tte Kunren-you Taiken de kantan ni...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Ore|Watashi|mc=1}}-tachi himajin da {{MC|na|ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Minna Mondo no tame ni tatakatteru nda kara, kenka ni naru wake ga {{MC|nai|nai no ni|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Da kara, hiruchaaru wo sentouryoku no tan'i ni tsukatta hou ga ii tte itta ndaro.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Chinami ni, oira wa go-bun no ichi inoshishi kurai da zo.
|vo_01_18_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' If one hilichurl could beat three wild boars...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' How many hilichurls would Master Jean and Diluc's fighting strength add up to?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' If you listened to what everyone says in Mondstadt, you'd probably know that Master Jean is the greatest.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But I think if Diluc got serious, even Master Jean wouldn't be a match for him.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' No, if it's Master Jean, she'd totally be fine.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' She'd totally be outclassed.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' [[Dandelion Breeze|Master Jean's Elemental Burst]] is strong, you know.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But that "area" would also make Diluc stronger, wouldn't it?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Master Jean wouldn't even need her Vision to beat Master Diluc.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Diluc would only need a [[Waster Greatsword]] to...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' ...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' We have too much free time on our hands.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' They both fight for Mondstadt, so there's no way they'd come to blows.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' That's why I said it was better to measure fighting strength in number of hilichurls.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' For the record, I could take about a fifth of a wild boar.

|vo_01_19_title      = レザーについて…
|vo_01_19_subtitle   = About [[Razor]]
|vo_01_19_quest      = The Meaning of Lupical
|vo_01_19_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Razor.ogg
|vo_01_19_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Razor.ogg
|vo_01_19_tx         = '''{name3}：'''({name})、毛筆を知ってるか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''動物の毛で作った筆で、字を書くのに{{MC|使う|使える|mc=1}}ものでしょ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''{{MC|うん、正解|ああ、正解だ|mc=1}}！いい毛筆は璃月商人{{MC|のほうで|に|mc=1}}高値で売れる{{MC|と|って|mc=1}}聞いたぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンも毛筆を作りたい？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''おう！でも野生の狼は狂暴だからレザーの毛で作ろう！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''レザーはモフモフしてるし、きっといい狼の毛筆ができるはずだ！そしたらオイラたちもお金持ちになれるぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''その材料だと筆に雷元素が含まれてて使えない{{MC|と思うけど|でしょ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''それにレザーは狼じゃないし、そもそも高価な毛筆は狼じゃなくて狼毫の毛を使って作ったものだから…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''え&mdash;&mdash;だって字で書くと狼って文字が入ってるじゃんかよ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''ほら、シードル湖もシードルでできてるわけじゃない{{MC|だろ|でしょ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ああ&mdash;&mdash;たしかに！
|vo_01_19_rm         = '''Paimon:''' (Tabibito), mouhitsu wo shitteru ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Doubutsu no ke de tsukutta fude de, ji wo kaku no ni {{MC|tsukau|tsukaeru|mc=1}} mono desho?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' {{MC|Un, seikai|Aa, seikai da|mc=1}}! Ii mouhitsu wa Riiywe shounin {{MC|no hou de|ni|mc=1}} takane de ureru {{MC|to|tte|mc=1}} kiita zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon mo mouhitsu wo tsukuritai?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Ou! De mo yasei no ookami wa kyoubou da kara Rezaa no ke de tsukurou!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Rezaa wa mofumofu shiteru shi, kitto ii ookami no mouhitsu ga dekiru hazu da! Soshitara oira-tachi mo o-kanemochi ni nareru zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sono zairyou da to fude wa Kaminari Genso ga fukumaretete tsukaenai {{MC|to omou kedo|desho|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sore ni Rezaa wa ookami ja nai shi, somosomo kouka-na mouhitsu wa ookami ja nakute itachi no ke wo tsukatte tsukutta mono da kara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' E{{lmdash}} Da tte ji de kaku to ookami tte moji ga haitteru jan ka yo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Hora, Shiidoru-ko wa shiidoru de dekiteru wake ja nai {{MC|daro|desho|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Aa{{lmdash}} Tashika ni!
|vo_01_19_tl         = '''Paimon:''' (Traveler), do you know about ink brushes?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' They're brushes made from animal hair, and you can use them to write, right?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Yup, that's right! I've heard that you can sell fine ink brushes to Liyue's merchants for high prices!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Paimon, do you want to make ink brushes too?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Yeah! But wild wolves are fierce, so let's use Razor's fur!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Razor is all fluffy, and [we] can definitely make great wolf-fur brushes! And then we can get rich!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' With that material, the ink brushes would be filled with Electro energy, and I don't think they'd be usable.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Besides, Razor isn't a wolf, and in the first place, expensive ink brushes are made from weasel fur, not wolf fur...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Huh&mdash; But when you write the name down, doesn't it say "wolf" right there?<ref group="TN •" name="weasel">In Chinese, {{lang|mini=1|zh={{wt|狼毫}}|zh_rm=lángháo|zh_lit=wolf hair}} refers to a type of ink brush made with {{w|Siberian weasel}} fur. This is explained by the name of the weasel {{lang|zh=黄鼠狼|zh_rm=huángshǔláng|zh_lit=yellow rat wolf}} being reduced to its final character. The apparent discrepancy between the names is alluded to across all voice-over languages, but the Japanese line introduces an additional element of confusion by reading {{ja|狼毫}} itself as ''itachi'' "weasel."</ref><br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Well, there's no way Cider Lake is made of cider.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oh&mdash; That's true!

|vo_01_20_title      = クレーについて…
|vo_01_20_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_01_20_quest      = True Treasure
|vo_01_20_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Klee.ogg
|vo_01_20_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Klee.ogg
|vo_01_20_tx         = '''{name3}：'''クレーは面白い子だよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''騎士団のみんなに愛されてて、まさにマスコットと言っても過言じゃない。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンとクレー…{{MC|どちら|どっち|mc=1}}が上だろう？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''あっ、そうだった、パイモンはマスコットじゃなくて…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''おいっ、なにを言おうとしてるか分かってるぞ。その冗談、面白くないからな。
|vo_01_20_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Kuree wa omoshiroi ko da yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kishi-dan no minna ni aisaretete, masa ni masukotto to itte mo kagon ja nai.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon to Kuree... {{MC|Dochira|Docchi|mc=1}} ga ue darou?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' A', sou datta, Paimon wa masukotto ja nakute...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oi', nani wo iou to shiteru ka wakatteru zo. Sono joudan, omoshirokunai kara na.
|vo_01_20_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Klee sure is an interesting kid.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' She's beloved by all the Knights, and it wouldn't be an exaggeration to call her their mascot.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Paimon or Klee... Who would be better?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Oh, right, Paimon's not a mascot, but...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hey, I know what you're about to say. That joke isn't funny, you know.

|vo_01_21_title      = 伝説の万能メイドについて…
|vo_01_21_subtitle   = About the [[Noelle|"Wondermaid"]]
|vo_01_21_waypoint   = in the [[City of Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_21_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Wondermaid.ogg
|vo_01_21_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Wondermaid.ogg
|vo_01_21_tx         = '''{name3}：'''生活の豆知識の時間だ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''生活の豆知識？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''モンドで、どう直しても直せない、もしくは何回洗っても落ちない汚れがあったら…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''空に向かって大声でこう叫ぶといいんだ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''「ノーーエーールーーー！」<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''そしたら悩み事はすぐ解決するぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''それがモンドの生活の{{MC|豆知識|豆知識なの|mc=1}}？すごい、勉強になった…
|vo_01_21_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Seikatsu no mamechishiki no jikan da!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Seikatsu no mamechishiki?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mondo de, dou naoshite mo naosenai, moshiku wa nankai aratte mo ochinai yogore ga attara...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sora ni mukatte oogoe de kou sakebu to ii nda.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' "Noooeeeruuuu!"<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Soshitara nayamigoto wa sugu kaiketsu suru zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Sore ga Mondo no seikatsu no {{MC|mamechishiki|mamechishiki na no|mc=1}}? Sugoi, benkyou ni natta...
|vo_01_21_tl         = '''Paimon:''' It's time for a little life tip!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' A little life tip?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' In Mondstadt, if there's something you can't fix no matter how hard you try, or there's a stain that won't go away no matter how many times you wash it...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Just yell into the skies, like this.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' "Noeeeelle!"<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' And your troubles will soon be solved.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' So that's one of Mondstadt's little life tips? Wow, good to know...

|vo_01_22_title      = フィッシュルについて…
|vo_01_22_subtitle   = About [[Fischl]]
|vo_01_22_quest      = For a Tomorrow Without Tears
|vo_01_22_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Fischl.ogg
|vo_01_22_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Fischl.ogg
|vo_01_22_tx         = '''{name3}：'''フィッシュルは他の人と違うよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''たとえば？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''たとえば、喋る鴉と共に行動してるとことか。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''うん、{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}もパイモンと一緒に旅してるし、そんなに変わらない{{MC|だろ|でしょ|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でも、オズはフィッシュルの言葉を翻訳できるのに、パイモンは…うん…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''なに言ってんだよ！？オイラは鴉よりずっとすごいぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''たとえば？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''うっ…えっと…うーん…たとえば翼がなくても飛べるとことか！
|vo_01_22_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Fisshuru wa hoka no hito to chigau yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Tatoeba?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Tatoeba, shaberu karasu to tomo ni koudou shiteru toko to ka.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Un, {{MC|ore|watashi|mc=1}} mo Paimon to issho ni tabi shiteru shi, sonna ni kawaranai {{MC|daro|desho|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo, Ozu wa Fisshuru no kotoba wo hon'yaku dekiru no ni, Paimon wa... un...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Nani itte nda yo!? Oira wa karasu yori zutto sugoi zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Tatoeba?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' U'... etto... uun... Tatoeba tsubasa ga nakute mo toberu toko to ka!
|vo_01_22_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Fischl is different from other people out there.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' How so?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Like how she works together with a talking raven.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Hmm, I'm traveling with you, so it's not all that different, is it?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But Oz can translate Fischl's words, while you... hmm...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' What are you talking about!? I'm way better than some raven!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' How so?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Uh... well... hmm... Like how I can fly even without wings!

|vo_01_23_title      = ペットについて…
|vo_01_23_subtitle   = About Pets
|vo_01_23_quest      = For a Tomorrow Without Tears
|vo_01_23_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Pets.ogg
|vo_01_23_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Pets.ogg
|vo_01_23_tx         = '''({name})：'''そういえば、フィッシュルも自分のことを「異世界の旅人」って{{MC|言ってたな|言ってた|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''この点は{{MC|俺|私|mc=1}}と同じだし、それにペットを連れてるとこも同じ{{MC|だ|だね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ペット？違う違う…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''でも彼女の鴉「オズ」は…見た目がかっこいいし、言葉遣いも礼儀正しい。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''しかも偵察できるし、戦えるし、役に立つ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''フィッシュルと話し合って、たまに交換してみるのも面白い{{MC|かもしれない、|かもね？|mc=1}}1～2週間{{MC|くらいさ|くらい|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''オイラの言い分は聞かないのかよ！？
|vo_01_23_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Sou ieba, Fisshuru mo jibun no koto wo "isekai no tabibito" tte {{MC|itteta na|itteta|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kono ten wa {{MC|ore|watashi|mc=1}} to onaji da shi, sore ni petto wo tsureteru toko mo onaji {{MC|da|da ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Petto? Chigau chigau...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' De mo kanojo no karasu "Ozu" wa... Mitame ga kakkoii shi, kotobadzukai mo reigi-tadashii.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Shikamo teisatsu dekiru shi, tatakaeru shi, yaku ni tatsu.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Fisshuru to hanashiatte, tama ni koukan shite miru no mo omoshiroi {{MC|ka mo shirenai,|ka mo ne?|mc=1}} Ichi~ni-shuukan {{MC|kurai sa|kurai|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oira no iibun wa kikanai no ka yo!?
|vo_01_23_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Speaking of which, Fischl was also calling herself a "traveler from another world"...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' She's like me in that way, and also in the way we both bring a pet along with us.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' A pet? No, no...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' But her raven, Oz... He looks cool, and speaks politely too.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' On top of that, he can scout and he can fight, which is useful.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' I bet it'd be interesting if I talked with Fischl so we could trade companions once in a while, for about a week or two at a time.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Do you even care what I have to say!?

|vo_01_24_title      = 飛行について…
|vo_01_24_subtitle   = About Flying
|vo_01_24_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_24_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Flying.ogg
|vo_01_24_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Flying.ogg
|vo_01_24_tx         = '''{name3}：'''({name})、オイラが飛ぶコツを教えてやるよ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''3、2、1！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''えっ、もういない。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''まあ、疲れてるし、ここでもう少し{{MC|休もう|休もうかな|mc=1}}…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''心は一緒に飛んでる{{MC|から|よ|mc=1}}…うん…
|vo_01_24_rm         = '''Paimon:''' (Tabibito), oira ga tobu kotsu wo oshiete yaru yo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' San, ni, ichi!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' E', mou inai.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Maa, tsukareteru shi, koko de mou sukoshi {{MC|yasumou|yasumou ka na|mc=1}}...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kokoro wa issho ni tonderu {{MC|kara|yo|mc=1}}... Un...
|vo_01_24_tl         = '''Paimon:''' (Traveler), I'm gonna teach you the secret to flying!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Three, two, one!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Ah, [she's] already gone.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Well, I'm tired, so let's just rest here for a bit...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' My heart is flying with you... Mm...

|vo_01_25_title      = スライムについて…
|vo_01_25_subtitle   = About Slimes
|vo_01_25_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_25_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Slimes.ogg
|vo_01_25_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Slimes.ogg
|vo_01_25_tx         = '''{name3}：'''({name})、おまえはどのタイプのスライムが好きだ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|炎|氷|mc=1}}スライムかな。近づくと{{MC|熱気|冷気|mc=1}}を感じるから、{{MC|冬|夏|mc=1}}に役立つと思う。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''実用性で考えるのか、さすがだな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンは？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''オイラはどれも好きだぞ！どれも美味しいからな！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''美味しい…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''スライムをくるくるして、しゃかしゃかして&mdash;&mdash;オリジナルドリンクにすると、「パイモンスペシャル」になるぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''そ、そうなんだ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''じゃあ、非常食ランキングのパイモンの順位をもう少し低くしようかな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''その順位にオイラを入れないでくれるか&mdash;&mdash;！？
|vo_01_25_rm         = '''Paimon:''' (Tabibito), omae wa dono taipu no Suraimu ga suki da?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Honoo|Koori|mc=1}} Suraimu ka na. Chikadzuku to {{MC|nekki|reiki|mc=1}} wo kanjiru kara, {{MC|fuyu|natsu|mc=1}} ni yakudatsu to omou.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Jitsuyousei de kangaeru no ka, sasuga da na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon wa?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oira wa dore mo suki da zo! Dore mo oishii kara na!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Oishii...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Suraimu wo kurukuru shite, shakashaka shite{{lmdash}} orijinaru dorinku ni suru to, "Paimon Supesharu" ni naru zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' So, sou nan da...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Jaa, hijoushoku rankingu no Paimon no jun'i wo mou sukoshi hikuku shiyou ka na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Sono jun'i ni oira wo irenaide kureru ka{{lmdash}}!?
|vo_01_25_tl         = '''Paimon:''' (Traveler), what type of Slime do you like best?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' {{MC|Pyro|Cryo|mc=1}} Slimes, I suppose. You can feel {{MC|heat|cold|mc=1}} just by getting close to them, so I think they'll be useful in {{MC|winter|summer|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' So you're thinking in practical terms, just as I thought.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' What about you, Paimon?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I like them all! They're all tasty!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Tasty...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Stir some Slimes round and round, and give them a shakey-shake &mdash; turn them into an original drink, and that's the "Paimon Special"!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' I... I see...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Well, I suppose I can move Paimon a little lower in the emergency food rankings.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Could you please not put me on that list at all&mdash;!?

|vo_01_26_title      = ヒルチャールについて…
|vo_01_26_subtitle   = About Hilichurls
|vo_01_26_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_26_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Hilichurls.ogg
|vo_01_26_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Hilichurls.ogg
|vo_01_26_tx         = '''({name})：'''ヒルチャールに対して少しやりすぎたかな？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''確かに…たまにオイラたちって蜂の巣を見てどうしても{{MC|つつきたく|突きたく|mc=1}}なる子供みたいだよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|あっ、いや|あ、えっと|mc=1}}…「つつく」{{MC|って|っていう|mc=1}}程度だったかな？
|vo_01_26_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' Hiruchaaru ni taishite sukoshi yarisugita ka na?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Tashika ni... tama ni oira-tachi tte hachi no su wo mite doushite mo tsutsukitaku naru kodomo mitai da yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|A', iya|A, etto|mc=1}}... "Tsutsuku" {{MC|tte|tte iu|mc=1}} teido datta ka na?
|vo_01_26_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' Have we been going too far with the hilichurls?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' It's true that... sometimes we seem like children who just can't resist poking the hornet's nest.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Um, well... Was it really just "poking"?

|vo_01_27_title      = 「好睡族」について…
|vo_01_27_subtitle   = About the Sleepers
|vo_01_27_waypoint   = at [[Dadaupa Gorge]], [[Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_27_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Sleepers.ogg
|vo_01_27_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Sleepers.ogg
|vo_01_27_tx         = '''({name})：'''「好睡族」…ヒルチャールの部族名は{{MC|変わってる|変わってるね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''好睡族のヒルチャールは隙を見つけては眠るんだぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''やつらの獣皮ベッドはすごくふわふわだって聞いたけど、寝てみたいと思わないか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンもそう思ってるの？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''オイラは浮いたまま寝れるぞ！空気は一番ふわふわなベッドだからな。へへっ、羨ましいか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''…ちょっとだけ。
|vo_01_27_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' "Kousui Zoku"... Hiruchaaru no buzoku-mei wa {{MC|kawatteru|kawatteru ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kousui Zoku no hiruchaaru wa suki wo mitsukete wa nemuru nda zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Yatsura no juuhi beddo wa sugoku fuwafuwa da tte kiita kedo, nete mitai to omowanai ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon mo sou omotteru no?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oira wa uita mama nereru zo! Kuuki wa ichiban fuwafuwa na beddo da kara na. Hehe', urayamashii ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ...Chotto dake.
|vo_01_27_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' The "Sleeper tribe"... Hilichurls sure have some strange tribe names.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' The hilichurls of the Sleeper tribe will sleep whenever they get a chance.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I've heard that their animal-skin beds are really soft. Do you wanna try sleeping in them?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Are you thinking about it too?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I can sleep while floating! The air is the softest bed. Hehe, are you jealous?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...Just a little.

|vo_01_28_title      = 「好肉族」について…
|vo_01_28_subtitle   = About the Meaties
|vo_01_28_waypoint   = at [[Dadaupa Gorge]], [[Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_28_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Meaties.ogg
|vo_01_28_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Meaties.ogg
|vo_01_28_tx         = '''({name})：'''「好肉族」…ヒルチャールの部族名は{{MC|変わってる|変わってるね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''好肉族のヒルチャールは定期的に祭事を行うんだ。やつらの祭壇はかなり壮観だぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''何のために祭事を？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''「毎日肉が食べられますように」ってさ！いい願い事だろ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''…想像通りの答え{{MC|で|だね|mc=1}}、意外性が{{MC|ない|ないかな|mc=1}}。
|vo_01_28_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' "Kouniku Zoku"... Hiruchaaru no buzoku-mei wa {{MC|kawatteru|kawatteru ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Kouniku Zoku no hiruchaaru wa teiki-teki ni saiji wo okonau nda. Yatsura no saidan wa kanari soukan da zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Nan no tame ni saiji wo?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' "Mainichi niku ga taberaremasu you ni" tte sa! Ii negaigoto daro?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' ...Souzou-doori no kotae {{MC|de|da ne|mc=1}}, igaisei ga {{MC|nai|nai ka na|mc=1}}.
|vo_01_28_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' The "Meaty tribe"... Hilichurls sure have some strange tribe names.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' The hilichurls of the Meaty tribe conduct regular rituals. Their altars are pretty spectacular.<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' What are the rituals for?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' "May there be meat to eat every day"! It's a great wish, isn't it?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' ...That's exactly the answer I imagined, no surprises there.

|vo_01_29_title      = 「日食族」について…
|vo_01_29_subtitle   = About the Eclipse Tribe
|vo_01_29_waypoint   = at [[Dadaupa Gorge]], [[Mondstadt]]
|vo_01_29_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About the Eclipse Tribe.ogg
|vo_01_29_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About the Eclipse Tribe.ogg
|vo_01_29_tx         = '''({name})：'''「日食族」…ヒルチャールにも部族らしい部族名がある{{MC|んだ|んだね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''日食族のヒルチャールは謎に包まれてるぞ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''あの部族のヒルチャールはみんな「日食」のマークが描けるんだ。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''でも日食族のシャーマンだけが、そのマークの意味を知ってるらしい…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''（日食…）<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''ん？({name})、なんか言ったか？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''{{MC|ああ|あっ|mc=1}}、今夜何肉のスープにするか聞いた{{MC|んだ|の|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''なんで急にそんな話になるんだ、おまえは好肉族のヒルチャールかよ&mdash;&mdash;イノシシ肉がいいぞ、サンキュー！
|vo_01_29_rm         = '''(Tabibito):''' "Nisshoku Zoku"... Hiruchaaru ni mo buzoku-rashii buzoku-mei ga aru {{MC|nda|nda ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Nisshoku Zoku no hiruchaaru wa nazo ni tsutsumareteru zo.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Ano buzoku no hiruchaaru wa minna "nisshoku" no maaku ga kakeru nda.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' De mo Nisshoku Zoku no shaaman dake ga, sono maaku no imi wo shitteru rashii...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' (Nisshoku...)<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' N? (Tabibito), nanka itta ka?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' {{MC|Aa|A'|mc=1}}, kon'ya nani-niku no suupu ni suru ka kiita {{MC|nda|no|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Nande kyuu ni sonna hanashi ni naru nda, omae wa Kouniku Zoku no hiruchaaru ka yo{{lmdash}} Inoshishi-niku ga ii zo, sankyuu!
|vo_01_29_tl         = '''(Traveler):''' The "Eclipse tribe"... So Hilichurls have some typical tribe names, too.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' The hilichurls of the Eclipse tribe are shrouded in mystery.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' All the hilichurls of that tribe can draw an "eclipse" symbol.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' But it seems that only the shaman of the Eclipse tribe knows the meaning of the symbol...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' (Eclipse...)<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hmm? (Traveler), did you say something?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Ah, I just asked what kind of meat should go in the soup tonight.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Why bring that up all of a sudden? Are you a hilichurl from the Meaty tribe&mdash;? Boar meat is good, thank you!

|vo_01_30_title      = 財宝について…
|vo_01_30_subtitle   = About Riches
|vo_01_30_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_30_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Riches.ogg
|vo_01_30_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Riches.ogg
|vo_01_30_tx         = '''{name3}：'''オイラ…体調、ちょっとよくないかも…<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''どうした{{MC|んだ|の|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''もう長いこと、この手で宝箱を開けてないんだ、このままだと…このままだと！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''このままだと、パイモンはいつかモラに釣られて罠を踏んじゃう{{MC|だろうな|かもね|mc=1}}。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''おい！オイラは飛べるんだぞ、そんなのに騙されない。
|vo_01_30_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Oira... taichou, chotto yokunai ka mo...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Doushita {{MC|nda|no|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Mou nagai koto, kono te de takarabako wo aketenai nda, kono mama da to... kono mama da to!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Kono mama da to, Paimon wa itsuka Mora ni tsurarete wana wo funjau {{MC|darou na|ka mo ne|mc=1}}.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oi! Oira wa toberu nda zo, sonna no ni damasarenai.
|vo_01_30_tl         = '''Paimon:''' I'm... not feeling so good...<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' What's the matter?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' I haven't opened a treasure chest with my own hands for ages. If this keeps up... if this keeps up...!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' If this keeps up, one day you'll be baited by Mora and end up stepping on a trap.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hey! I can fly, you know. I won't fall for that kind of thing.

|vo_01_31_title      = 太ることについて…
|vo_01_31_subtitle   = About Weight Gain
|vo_01_31_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_31_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Weight Gain.ogg
|vo_01_31_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Weight Gain.ogg
|vo_01_31_tx         = '''{name3}：'''はぁああ、最近旅の途中で美味しいものをたくさん食べたよな。<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''美味しいものを食べると、旅の疲れも一気に消えるってもんだ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''うん、けど…パイモンって{{MC|太ったら|太ったら、|mc=1}}飛べなくなったりしないの？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''フン、そんなことないぞ！オイラは食べても太らない体質なんだ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''へぇ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''だからもっともっと美味しいものを食べるぞ！<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''食べた分が肉にならないなんて、非常食として不合格{{MC|じゃない|じゃないかな|mc=1}}？<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''おい&mdash;&mdash;！ま、まさか合格した非常食が他にあるのか？
|vo_01_31_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Haaaa, saikin tabi no tochuu de oishii mono wo takusan tabeta yo na.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oishii mono wo taberu to, tabi no tsukare mo ikki ni kieru tte mon da!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Un, kedo... Paimon tte {{MC|futottara|futottara,|mc=1}} tobenaku nattari shinai no?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Fun, sonna koto nai zo! Oira wa tabete mo futoranai taishitsu nan da!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Hee...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Da kara motto motto oishii mono wo taberu zo!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Tabeta bun ga niku ni naranai nante, hijoushoku toshite fugoukaku {{MC|ja nai|ja nai ka na|mc=1}}?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Oi{{lmdash}}! Ma, masaka goukaku shita hijoushoku ga hoka ni aru no ka?
|vo_01_31_tl         = '''Paimon:''' Ahhh, [we've] had a lot of good food on our travels recently.<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' When you eat good food, the fatigue from your journey will go away just like that!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Yeah, but... Won't you be unable to fly if you get fat?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hmph, no such thing! I'm built so I can eat without getting fat!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' Huh...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' So, I'm gonna eat more and more good food!<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Traveler):''' If what you eat doesn't fatten you up, then don't you fail as emergency food?<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Hey&mdash;! D&mdash;Don't you have anything else that passes as emergency food?

|vo_01_32_title      = 猫派と犬派について…
|vo_01_32_subtitle   = About Cat People and Dog People
|vo_01_32_quest      = The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
|vo_01_32_file_male  = VO_{language}{character1}_About Cat People and Dog People.ogg
|vo_01_32_file_female= VO_{language}{character2}_About Cat People and Dog People.ogg
|vo_01_32_tx         = '''{name3}：'''猫と犬、おまえはどっちが好きだ？<br /><!--
                    -->'''({name})：'''パイモンの方が好きかな！<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''うわっ。それ反則だぞ…<br /><!--
                    -->'''{name3}：'''いや、違う。オイラはペットじゃない！
|vo_01_32_rm         = '''Paimon:''' Neko to inu, omae wa docchi ga suki da?<br /><!--
                    -->'''(Tabibito):''' Paimon no hou ga suki ka na!<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Uwa'. Sore hansoku da zo...<br /><!--
                    -->'''Paimon:''' Iya, chigau. Oira wa petto ja nai!
